snippet: Gains were broad, with the Nasdaq closing at its highest level since 2000 and nine of the 10 major Standard & Poor’s 500 sector indexes rising.
abstract: Stocks close higher, with major indexes notching a second straight week of broad gains as investors seem again willing to overlook soft economic data stemming from bad weather.
lead_paragraph: Gains were broad, with the Nasdaq closing at its highest level since 2000 and nine of the 10 major Standard & Poor’s 500 sector indexes rising.
